rows.label: qev019001_MSG0001
rows.name:
Pardon me, but you would not happen to be a
BLADE operative by any chance?
If so, I have a small favor to ask.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev019001_MSG0002
rows.name:
I am an engineer responsible for making parts used
in Orphean products.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev019001_MSG0003
rows.name:
But the production line has been impeded lately due to
a dearth of miranium.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev019001_MSG0004
rows.name:
Rather than wait for matters to worsen, I sent my
assistant, Non'barac, to collect more.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev019001_MSG0005
rows.name:
But I am afraid I have lost contact with her,
and there's no sign of a miranium delivery.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev019001_MSG0006
rows.name:
I am quite concerned, obviouslyâ€”at this rate,
production could cease altogether.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev019001_JNK0010
rows.name: Chastise

rows.label: qev019001_SEL0011
rows.name:
Ask why San'luarb isn't more worried
about his missing friend.

rows.label: qev019001_JNK0020
rows.name: Sympathize

rows.label: qev019001_SEL0021
rows.name:
Tell San'luarb you see how such
a thing would be troubling.

rows.label: qev019001_MSG0007
rows.name:
Of course I am worried about her. If she is gone,
not only am I out whatever miranium she found,
but I am also missing valuable labor.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev019001_MSG0008
rows.name:
You think I would view such losses lightly?
I am not a monster.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev019001_MSG0009
rows.name:
Yes? Why are you looking at me like that?
Never mind. I shall continue.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev019001_MSG0010
rows.name:
Naturally. So many Orphean products are
custom-order, and not easily replaced.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev019001_MSG0011
rows.name:
And if production stops, it has implications for
our chances of survival on Mira.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev019001_MSG0012
rows.name: I would like to ask your help in finding Non'barac.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev019001_MSG0013
rows.name:
She may have gone dark on us, but she is wearing
the finest equipment our company produces.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev019001_MSG0014
rows.name:
I have no doubt whatsoever that she has managed to
extract more miranium than a human could.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev019001_MSG0015
rows.name:
So please escort her back to the city and save our
company from this crisis.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev019001_MSG0016
rows.name:
She set out for the Delusians South Summit in Sylvalum.
I shall send you the precise coordinates.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev019001_MSG0017
rows.name:
...There you are. Oh, and if Non'barac happens to be
dead, never mind the body. Just the miranium will do.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev019001_MSG0018
rows.name:
With so many different industries competing for it,
it is becoming much harder to secure miranium.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev019001_MSG0019
rows.name:
I sent Non'barac out in hopes of establishing a source
we might enjoy exclusively.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev019001_MSG0020
rows.name:
I cannot even imagine what she is doing out there
while our production line sits here idled.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev019001_MSG0021
rows.name: This is a fine mess indeed.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev019001_MSG0022
rows.name:
Non'barac returned, but apparently she failed to find
any miranium.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev019001_MSG0023
rows.name:
Our parts manufacturing will grind to a halt at
this rate, and it could even spell the very ruin of
Orphean Technologies.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev019001_MSG0024
rows.name: Is this FrontierNav of yours truly so difficult to expand?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev019001_JNK0030
rows.name: Confirm

rows.label: qev019001_SEL0031
rows.name: Tell San'luarb that it's highly difficult for an amateur.

rows.label: qev019001_JNK0040
rows.name: Deny

rows.label: qev019001_SEL0041
rows.name: Say that it's a piece of cake.

rows.label: qev019001_MSG0025
rows.name:
And you have been at it since the day you crashed
here, correct?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev019001_MSG0026
rows.name:
Hmm... I will grant that your experience may outweigh
our technological advantages in this case.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev019001_MSG0027
rows.name:
How marvelous. I see. You all must have a natural
kind of proficiency for it.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev019001_MSG0028
rows.name:
Then I suppose Non'barac's proposal is the best choice.
We will leave this to a BLADE operative.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev019001_MSG0029
rows.name:
Interested? You shall be compensated, of course.
We need a mere 4,200 units of miranium, if we may.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev019001_MSG0030
rows.name:
I ask that you use your technology and experience
to help rescue our company from this predicament.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev019001_MSG0031
rows.name:
From what Non'barac has told me, our race's
lack of combat aptitude makes installing data
probes a rather difficult task.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev019001_MSG0032
rows.name:
So I ask you to lend us your strength, that we may
then return the favor with our science.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev019001_MSG0033
rows.name:
Therefore I am trusting you to procure those 4,200 units
of miranium.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev019001_MSG0034
rows.name:
Welcome back, [ST:playername ].
How went the miranium mining?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev019001_JNK0050
rows.name: Deliver

rows.label: qev019001_SEL0051
rows.name: Hand over 4,200 units of miranium.

rows.label: qev019001_JNK0060
rows.name: Keep

rows.label: qev019001_SEL0061
rows.name: Hold on to your miranium for now.

rows.label: qev019001_MSG0035
rows.name:
Ah! This should be more than enough to sustain our
current manufacturing efforts.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev019001_MSG0036
rows.name:
I see I was right to ask for your help on this.
Here is your payment, with my compliments.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev019001_MSG0037
rows.name:
And while we are conversing, are you familiar with
a woman named Kirsty?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev019001_MSG0038
rows.name:
Non'barac and I just met with her recently.
She has begun instructing non-humans in the use of
FrontierNav.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev019001_MSG0039
rows.name:
It has been most revelatory, I must say.
I never knew the full degree of risk involved
in installing data probes out in the wilderness.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev019001_MSG0040
rows.name: I fear we Orphe are not built for such a task.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev019001_MSG0041
rows.name:
I am quite sure we will be relying on BLADE operatives
such as yourself for all matters to do with FrontierNav
in the future.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev019001_JNK0070
rows.name: Agree

rows.label: qev019001_SEL0071
rows.name: Tell San'luarb that you're happy to help on his behalf.

rows.label: qev019001_JNK0080
rows.name: Encourage

rows.label: qev019001_SEL0081
rows.name: Suggest that San'luarb should try it out for himself.

rows.label: qev019001_MSG0042
rows.name:
Yes, most reliable indeed. Truly, you people of Earth
are ideal partners in matters of business.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev019001_MSG0043
rows.name:
I hope you will continue installing additional mining
probes on our behalf.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev019001_MSG0044
rows.name:
Yes, but considering the costs and time involved
in such an undertaking, asking for your help is the
more efficient option.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev019001_MSG0045
rows.name:
Rest assured, you shall be compensated fairly for
the risk. I hope ours will be a long and fruitful
partnership.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev019001_MSG0046
rows.name: At this rate, production will cease entirely...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev019001_MSG0047
rows.name: Please find that miranium with all haste.[ST:wait ]
